sessions.description: The list of sessions that compose the form.

submission.description: Provide the information to submit the form data.

url.description: The url of which the collected form data will be submitted to.

uniqueAnswer.description: A unique answer id to decide if the form is a duplicate. (optional)

sessionOrder.description: Enable alternative session orders to be presented. (optional)

static.description: List of indices of sessions to be presented in that order. (optional)

dynamic.description: Fetch the session order on the fly from the provided url. (optional)

url.description: The url to get the session order.

uniqueAnswer.description: The list of orders that are expected to be returned. (optional)

session.description: A session is a page of the form. It contains questions and can show elapsed time if requested.

timeLimit.description: Show the remaining time the respondent has to finish the session, the respondent can still answer if he/she overtimes. (optional)

questions.description: The questions that compose a session.

question.description: A may contain text, videos and elements to record respondents answers.

contents.description: The collection of elements that compose a question.

content.description: A unit of content that composes a question. It can be markdown text, a video or a answer element.

answer.description: An answer element that will be collected and submitted by the form.

id.description: The answer id, it must be unique among all other answers of all questions and sessions.

required.description: Indicates if the the answer element must be answered to proceed.

type.description: The type of answer to be rendered.

shortAnswer.description: Short answer, accepts a single line of text.

longAnswer.description: Long answer, accepts multiple line of text.

multiAnswer.description: A list of options to be chosen.

options.description: The options that can be chosen

likertAnswer.description: A list of numbered options to be chosen with only the first and last elements labeled.
